name: Legal Demand Letter
description: Formal demand letter for legal claims or disputes

sections.title: Dear {recipient_name}:
sections.content: This letter serves as a formal demand for payment in the amount of ${demand_amount} regarding {reason} that occurred on {incident_date}.

sections.title: 2. PREVIOUS COMMUNICATIONS
sections.content: Previous attempts to resolve this matter include: {previous_communications}

sections.title: 3. SUPPORTING DOCUMENTATION
sections.content: The following documents support this demand: {supporting_documents}

sections.title: 4. LEGAL BASIS
sections.content: This demand is supported by the following legal authorities: {legal_citations}

sections.title: 5. DEMAND
sections.content: I hereby demand payment in the amount of ${demand_amount} to be paid no later than {deadline}. The proposed settlement terms are as follows: {settlement_terms}

sections.title: 6. CONCLUSION
sections.content: If I do not receive payment or a satisfactory response by {deadline}, I will pursue all available legal remedies, including but not limited to filing a lawsuit to recover the amount owed, plus any additional costs, interest, and attorney fees as permitted by law.
